title: Person Of Interest  John Reese Tribute
author: MasterJacenSkywalker
comment: A very interesting,and moving video.The various show clips are melded together seamlessly.You have done justice to the John Reese character ! Thank You !
A great tribute to an even greater hero. R.I.P John Reese, you BAMF. You will be forever missed and never forgotten.
description:
Person Of Interest  Tribute John Reese


A little tribute I made for the amazing show Person Of Interest and more specifically about John Reese, enjoy !

Clips: Person of Interest
I do not own the footage or the song. 
All clips belong to CBS. No copyright infringement intended.
